conversations.content: On 2024-05-15 I have a meeting before lunch. How much time do I have to go to my lunch with Sarah? Give me the result in the format 'HH:MM'.

<function_thought>
To determine the time available before lunch on 2024-05-15, I need to fetch the scheduled calendar events for that day. This will allow me to find out when the meeting occurs and calculate the time until lunch.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_day_calendar_events(day="2024-05-15")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>
The calendar events for May 15, 2024, show the following:
- A team sync meeting from 10:00 AM to 11:00 AM.
- Lunch with Sarah scheduled from 12:30 PM to 1:30 PM.
- An introductory meeting starting at 3:00 PM.

Since the meeting before lunch is from 10:00 AM to 11:00 AM, and lunch is at 12:30 PM, I need to calculate the time available from the end of the team sync meeting until lunch. This gives us the duration from 11:00 AM to 12:30 PM.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[]</function_call>

<final_answer>1:30</final_answer>
